channel.title: [pi] help! [pi]
channel.description:
When i run the server i get
null, message from server: "Host 'MY IP HERE' is not allowed to connect to t his MySQL server" Unable to connect to MySQL Press any key to continue . . .
my code is
@echo off title YourServerNameHere java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: [pi] help! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

hell-boy:

Thanks works now noticed all i was doing wrong aswel

Np mate.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[center]You could try this:[/center]

@echo off
title bored.
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

[center]
If that doesn’t work try this:[/center]

@echo off
title bored.
java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic

@hell-boy wrote:

i do have another version of this with no MySQL but i don’t have a Run.bat for it can you send me the code for one its still PI but with no MySQL

item.title: [pi] help! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote author=hell-boy link=topic=472545.msg3455928#msg3455928 date=1294027750]

[quote=“hell-boy, post:3, topic:376622”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=472545.msg3455898#msg3455898 date=1294026482]

[quote]null, message from server: “Host ‘MY IP HERE’ is not allowed to connect to t
his MySQL server”
Unable to connect to MySQL
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

how?

The part in bold is the IP for Sql. Set it.

Flick through your server until you find “MY IP HERE”

searched everywhere cant find[/quote]

How is it typing that message out then… Lol.

Read full topic
